alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Goshen County; Laramie Valley; Niobrara County; North Laramie Range; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued March 09 at 8:25PM MST until March 10 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Dangerous wind chills as low as 30 degrees below zero. * WHERE...Southeast Wyoming and Northern Nebraska Panhandle. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Dangerously low wind chills can lead to frostbite in 15 minutes or less if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, knit hat, and mittens.
